attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm quite certain having read the previous petitions, that you will decline this one also. But many English people, would now like to start celebrating our Patron Saint with a marking of his own day. By proclaiming it a national holiday within England, and not the entire U.K
Allowing those who work within certain fields to gain one extra days holdiay, without the companies opening on our own Patron Saints day.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
